attributes.action: allow England fans the opportunity to purchase World Cup tickets on the secondary market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fans from every country in the world have the opportunity to buy World Cup tickets on the secondary market yet England fans are prohibited by law from doing so.  Because of this prohibition England fans are disadvantaged from gaining access to support our side in the World Cup and are forced to deal with unreliable street dealers to get tickets.  We ask the Prime Minister to repeal the provisions of the 1994 criminal justice and public order act that prohibit the resale of football tickets in this country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
